articles.author: Ed Cara
articles.title: America Has a Big Chronic Pain Problem - Gizmodo
articles.description: About 1 in every 5 American adults have experienced chronic pain recently, an analysis from the CDC shows.
articles.content: Around 17 million Americans had chronic pain so bad in 2021 that it drastically interfered with their lives, according to a recent study from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. The analy… [+3036 chars]
